mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lpComment(lp_seq, lpc_id, lpc_content, lpc_date) VALUES(#{lp_seq}, #{lpc_id}, #{lpc_content}, #{lpc_date})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM lpComment WHERE lp_seq = #{lp_seq} AND lpc_seq = #{lpc_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lpComment, users WHERE lp_seq = #{lp_seq} and lpc_id = us_id ORDER BY lpc_seq DESC
